name: Brittlo (Mini Jam #97)
description:
Is water available on Brittlo? Is this planet habitable, humanity's last chance?

The year is 2237 and it is up to you to find answers to these questions in this simulation - but watch out: the inhabitants are brittle. Do not harm them!

Controls
  • Move: W/D or LEFT/RIGHT ARROW KEYS
  • Jump: SPACE or RETURN
  • Quit to main menu: ESC
  • Alternatively the game can also be played using a joypad/controller (use the D-pad for movement)

This game was created for Mini Jam 97: Simulation.

This game was created using the Godot Engine. License information can be found at https://godotengine.org/license.
